title: UDL and Blended Learning Strategy Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education experience and basic proficiency in using digital educational tools
context.additional_context: For science education administrators/leaders, this program models and reinforces practical applications of UDL (Universal Design for Learning) and blended learning through case studies and hands-on practice.

learning_goals: Learners can design activity plans applying UDL’s three principles (engagement, representation, action/expression) to science lessons
Learners can establish and operationalize a blended learning environment using Zoom and LMS (Learning Management System)
Learners can analyze the correlation between UDL elements (accessibility, content, engagement) and academic achievement using learning analytics data

resources: Pre-Recorded UDL/Blended Learning Best Practices Video

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
